org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class EscalationApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.EscalationApi

public class EscalationApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Escalation API.

This class provides access to the escalations within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

Method Detail

getEscalation

public EscalationResponse getEscalation(int id)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Find a Escalation by ID.

Parameters:
id - The escalation ID to search for.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, the Escalation by the given name is returned via EscalationResponse.getEscalation().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getEscalations

public EscalationsResponse getEscalations()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Find all Escalations in system.

Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, a collection of Escalations is returned via EscalationsResponse.getEscalation().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
